import { useState } from 'react'; // import Select from 'react-select'; // import makeAnimated from 'react-select/animated'; function NewBookForm({ newBookInput, setNewBook, handleSubmit, getAuthors }) { const [selectedAuthors, SetSelectedAuthors] = useState([]); const authorNames = []; getAuthors.map(author => authorNames.push({value: author.name, label: author.name, id: author.id})) const {title, image, isbn, desc, publisher} = newBookInput return (
